Package com.ragego.engine

Define how we can play to a Go Game on a computer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameListener
    Listener for a Game.
    IAPlayer
    Special functions for IAPlayers.
    TurnListener
    Listen to know when to play.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTurnListener
    Turn listener that ignore start and end of turns.
    GameBoard
    Represent a board of Go.
    GameComputer
    This class compute a game for a given node.
    GameNode
    State of the game.
    HumanPlayer
    Represent a human which play.
    Intersection
    A coordinate on the GameBoard.
    Player
    A player should give some information about him.
    Shape
    Shape is the configuration of stones in their flexibility and efficiency at staying connected, forming eyes, and maintaining liberties.
    Stone
    This is the piece with which you play.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameNode.Action
    Describe actions possible in the game between two nodes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GoRuleViolation
    Describe a violation of Go rules

Define how we can play to a Go Game on a computer. This package implements a go game with
